mapper.sql: ID, CODE, ABBREVIATION, MARK, TYPE, GRADE, AREA, LINKMAN, TEL, FAX, ZIPCODE, ADDRESS, EMAIL, WEBSITE
mapper.insert: insert into TCOMPANY (ID, CODE, ABBREVIATION, MARK, TYPE, GRADE, AREA, LINKMAN, TEL, FAX, ZIPCODE, ADDRESS, EMAIL, WEBSITE) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{abbreviation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{grade,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{area,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{linkman,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fax,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zipcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{website,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update TCOMPANY
CODE = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ABBREVIATION = #{abbreviation,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MARK = #{mark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TYPE = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GRADE = #{grade,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AREA = #{area,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LINKMAN = #{linkman,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TEL = #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FAX = #{fax,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ZIPCODE = #{zipcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ADDRESS = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EMAIL = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WEBSITE = #{website,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update TCOMPANY set CODE = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ABBREVIATION = #{abbreviation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MARK = #{mark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TYPE = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GRADE = #{grade,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AREA = #{area,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LINKMAN = #{linkman,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TEL = #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FAX = #{fax,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ZIPCODE = #{zipcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ADDRESS = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EMAIL = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WEBSITE = #{website,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.sql: TCOMPANY.ID, PID, NAME, CODE, ABBREVIATION, MARK, TYPE, GRADE, AREA, LINKMAN, TEL, FAX, ZIPCODE, ADDRESS, EMAIL, WEBSITE, DESCRIPTION, CREATETIME, UPDATETIME
mapper.select:
select
from TCOMPANY join TPARTY on TCOMPANY.ID = TPARTY.ID

select
from TCOMPANY join TPARTY on TCOMPANY.ID = TPARTY.ID where PID is null or PID = ''
